Xdragus, that link you provided is no longer working as far as when I checked it.  Here is a better link: http://www.allsubs.org/subs-download/azumi-cd-2-2003-xivd-giso/295166/
I tested it and it worked perfectly.  Also, for those of you confused about how to get the subtitles to work-- I found it helpful to download the VLC media player.  Then, you go to file>open file, and it has two slots-- one for the actual .avi file and the other for the .srt (subtitles).
I'm sorry, but I posted the comment without watching the entire second CD.  It looks like the subtitles only work for about the first 10 minutes, and then they disappear.
